summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4108 for the improvement of the alley in Block 7, Green's Addition, being the alley between Yale Avenue North and Minor Avenue North, from East Boston Street to East Lynn Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 49347, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
